settings.heading: Fast Setup. Easy Storage. Built for Champions.
settings.text: Portable Horse Stalls & Pens – Handmade in the USA

settings.heading: Why QuickPro Panels?
settings.quote_text: Whether you are on the go to a rodeo, jackpot, trail ride, camping, or even need a temporary fence or stall at home, QuickPro Panels are your solution for quick, easy stalls or fencing. I have been involved in rodeo my entire life, being the footsteps of a fourth generation in my family to do so. I have traveled to rodeos all over and having panels has been a lifesaver at times when there are no stalls, they are very small or not safe, or to lessen the risk of contracting illnesses while being in barns with other horses. I am extremely picky where I keep my horses and have one that has escaped from my old panels, but has been unable to escape out of QuickPro Panels. I invented these for quick, functioning convenience & have a patent pending. QuickPro Panels take less panels to provide more stall area.
settings.disclaimer_content:
• QuickPro Panels are NOT intended for permanent use.
  • SHIPPING MUST BE TO A PLACE OF BUSINESS WITH A DOCK OR A FORKLIFT OR THE CUSTOMER WILL BE CHARGED ANOTHER $200 IF IT IS A RESIDENTIAL ADDRESS
  • Do NOT tie animals to panel.
  • Foam covers sent with panel to avoid scratching only. Welds are painted only to avoid rust.
  • Recommended to 'zig-zag' or use angles instead of straight lines when connecting more than 2 panels
  • Recommended to separate animals (horses) from one another if they fight between panel to avoid risks (shown in picture)
  • QuickPro Panels, QP Panels, LLC is in NO way responsible for ANY accidents with panels.

settings.title: Smart, Space-Saving Design
settings.text:
• Fast setup with no loose pieces
  • Locks at 9'9" and collapses to just 5' with the push of a button
  • Compact enough to fit in a truck bed, hay rack, or trailer

settings.title: Versatile & Practical
settings.text:
• Works as stall fronts, pens, or extra fencing at home or on the road
  • 4' tall with 21" ground clearance and 11" rail spacing
  • Can stand alone or connect easily with built-in chains

settings.title: Lightweight Yet Durable
settings.text:
• Weighs only 21 lbs per panel
  • Made from round galvanized steel for strength and longevity
  • Proudly handmade in the USA for over 10 years
  • Trusted by top athletes, including 2024 World Champions Kelsie Domer and Kassie Mowrey

settings.heading: READY TO RECEIVE OUR NEWSLETTER? JOIN NOW!

settings.quote: Giving my horses the best opportunity to rest, recover, and perform their best on the road is why I had to have these Panels. They are game changers.
settings.author: Jordan Jo Hollabaugh

settings.quote: These have been the biggest game changer, I truly can’t even tell you what a difference they make! I love these❤️

settings.question: How easy are QuickPro Panels to set up and store?
settings.answer: QuickPro Panels are designed for quick, hassle-free setup with no loose or extra pieces. They lock in place at 9'9" and collapse to just 5' with the push of a button.

settings.question: Where can I store QuickPro Panels when traveling?
settings.answer: When collapsed, QuickPro Panels fit perfectly in the back of a truck, in a hay rack/pod, or on the side of a trailer.

settings.question: What can I use QuickPro Panels for?
settings.answer: Each panel can be used as a stall front or combined to create pens, giving you flexibility for horses or livestock at home or on the road.

settings.question: What are the size and weight of each panel?
settings.answer: QuickPro Panels are 4' tall, with 21 inches of clearance from the ground to the bottom rail. Each panel weighs only 21 lbs.

settings.question: Where are QuickPro Panels made?
settings.answer: They’re handmade in the USA from durable round galvanized steel and have been trusted for over 10 years.

settings.question: How much does shipping cost?
settings.answer: Shipping rates are based on load size. Small Loads ship for $195, Medium for $275, and Large for $325. See checkout for details.

settings.heading: See QuickPro Panels in Action
settings.description: Experience the durability and ease of use that makes QuickPro the top choice for champions.
